locale.message: Provide journal usage statistics through a REST API that implements the SUSHI-Lite protocol. Journal statistics follow the COUNTER guidelines. Current
You must supply a valid customer_id to access this report.
You must supply a valid begin_date and end_date to access this report.
You can only request a count between 1 and 100.
You must supply a position_token that is 0 or greater.
